label: Schedule Transformer
description: A transformer that enables a user to setup a timer before executing a specific part of the flow.

inputs.label: Timer Duration
inputs.name: timerDuration
inputs.description: The duration of the timer in milliseconds.

inputs.label: Immediate Restore
inputs.name: resetOnReply
inputs.description: A flag indicating whether to reset the state when a user message is received before timer expires.

outputs.label: Trigger state
outputs.name: restoreState
outputs.description: The state to execute when the timer completes.

outputs.label: Reset State
outputs.name: resetState
outputs.description: The state to restore when the timer is reset.
